kit.leader_skill: "All-Out Struggle" or "Final Trump Card" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%

super_attack.name: Kaioken Attack (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: 4x Kaioken Kamehameha (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK & DEF for 4 turns; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; while sacrificing 4% HP

passive_skill.name: Power-Doubling Skill
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Vegeta" (Kid, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn: (Once) Ki +3 and ATK 100% up; (Once) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Great chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to STR Ki Spheres; (Once) Receives an additional Ki +2 per STR Ki Sphere obtained; For 7 turns from the character's entry turn: Ki +10 and DEF 100% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 159% up; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK 159% up; For every STR Ki Sphere obtained: Damage reduction rate 4% up; When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki: Performs a critical hit

lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Vegeta" (Kid, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn
Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Vegeta" (Kid, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn

lines.text: Great chance of performing a critical hit
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Vegeta" (Kid, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to STR Ki Spheres
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Vegeta" (Kid, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn

lines.text: Receives an additional Ki +2 per STR Ki Sphere obtained
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an enemy whose name includes "Vegeta" (Kid, Jr., etc. excluded) at the start of the character's attacking turn
For 7 turns from the character's entry turn
When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When attacking with 18 or more Ki
For every STR Ki Sphere obtained
When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki

active_skill.name: Hope-Imbued Spirit Bomb
active_skill.effect: Greatly raises ATK temporarily,; causes ultimate damage; Stuns the enemy for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 59% or less (once only)
